TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NameValueFileSectionHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

summary.span: Provides access to a configuration file.

span.span: Provides access to a configuration file.

summary.span: This type supports the .NET Framework configuration infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

span.span: This type supports the .NET Framework configuration infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le `file` attribut de la `` section spécifie un chemin d’accès relatif vers un fichier externe qui contient les paramètres de configuration d’application personnalisés.The `file` attribute of the `` section specifies a relative path to an external file that contains custom application-configuration settings. Les détails fournis dans le fichier agissent comme une `` section dans le fichier de configuration.The details provided in the file act as an `` section in the configuration file. Le fichier est accessible à l’aide de la classe.The file is accessed using the class. Élément racine du fichier doit correspondre à la section qui fait référence à celui-ci.The file's root element must match the section referring to it.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Create (object parent, object configContext, System.Xml.XmlNode section);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Create(object parent, object configContext, class System.Xml.XmlNode section) cil managed
Public Function Create (parent As Object, configContext As Object, section As XmlNode) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ Create(System::Object ^ parent, System::Object ^ configContext, System::Xml::XmlNode ^ section);
abstract member Create : obj * obj * System.Xml.XmlNode -> obj override this.Create : obj * obj * System.Xml.XmlNode -> obj

summary.span: Creates a new configuration handler and adds it to the section-handler collection based on the specified parameters.

span.span: Creates a new configuration handler and adds it to the section-handler collection based on the specified parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le `parent` paramètre d’objet agit comme les paramètres de configuration dans la section de configuration parente correspondante.The `parent` object parameter acts as the configuration settings in the corresponding parent configuration section. Le `configContext` paramètre d’objet est le chemin d’accès virtuel pour lequel le Gestionnaire de section de configuration calcule les valeurs de configuration.The `configContext` object parameter is the virtual path for which the configuration section handler computes configuration values. Normalement, ce paramètre est réservé et est `null`.Normally this parameter is reserved and is `null`. Le `section` paramètre est le qui contient les informations de configuration à gérer.The `section` parameter is the that contains the configuration information to be handled. Le `section` paramètre offre un accès direct au contenu XML de la section de configuration.The `section` parameter provides direct access to the XML contents of the configuration section.

exception.span: The file specified in the attribute of exists but cannot be loaded.

span.span: The file specified in the attribute of exists but cannot be loaded.

exception.span: \- or - The attribute of does not match the root element of the file specified in the attribute.

span.span: \- or - The attribute of does not match the root element of the file specified in the attribute.
